ygData.subject: quests on Veeshan
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, any of you other Veeshan wizzies up for maybe finishing some quests together sometime?  maybe this weekend? As nice as friends and guilds are...I often
ygData.messageBody:
Hey, any of you other Veeshan wizzies up for maybe finishing some quests
together sometime? maybe this weekend?

As nice as friends and guilds are...I often find everybody is out for their
own class-specific stuff. Would be fun to get a bunch of spell-casters
going around town to get some stuff for ourselves. Nuke-fest! I'm out to
try to for anything from the jboots, oracle robes, acumen mask, etc.

What do you think?...hehe. Are there even enough of us Veeshan Wizzies in
this list for a group? ;)

-- Lim'Dul
30 Wiz Veeshan
